overview: An erect phallus is a symbol of life, a cross a symbol of death. Chosen to live in a community and take part in a game of truth, 24 European and Maghrebi boys are filmed 24 hours a day in their most secret intimacy. They're not acting, they're living their emotions, desires and youthfulness live without hang-ups.  A real piece of reality TV which proves that neither love nor friendship have borders. Everywhere set aside for the game is for eruptions of tenderness and ecstasy.  14 intense scenes with two, three, five ... and a final orgy with 14 participants! A true hymn of brotherhood. The crème de la crème of Cadinot.  "Love, and do what you will" Saint Augustin, 354 AD - 430 AD
title: Nomades 2: Oriental Pleasures
